mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment(user_id, text, community_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{text}, #{communityId});
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.community_id, c.text, c.regdate, c.edit_date, (SELECT nickname FROM User WHERE user_id = c.user_id) AS nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Favorite_Community WHERE favorite_type_id = comment_id) AS favoriteCount from Comment c LEFT JOIN Favorite_Community fc ON c.community_id = fc.favorite_type_id AND fc.favorite_type = '2' where community_id = #{communityId};
select c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.community_id, c.text, c.regdate, c.edit_date, (SELECT nickname FROM User WHERE user_id = c.user_id) AS nickname, from Comment c where comment_id = #{commentId};
mapper.update: UPDATE Comment SET community_id = #{commentModify.communityId}, user_id = #{commentModify.userId}, text = #{commentModify.text}, edit_date = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
